Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the first inning
Jack Flaherty gave up eight runs in three innings
Andy Pages hit two home runs
Ryne Stanek struck out four batters
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers' vaunted pitching staff let them down early in the game
The Mets bats were too hot - finishing with 14 hits on 34 at-bats
Others: The game was played at Citi Field
The Dodgers' starter was Jack Flaherty
The Mets' reliever who got the win was Ryne Stanek
